[vc_row type=”full-width-section” full_height=”yes” columns_placement=”bottom” content_placement=”bottom” parallax=”tt_parallax” parallax_image=”7979″ overlay=”1″ overlay_color=”rgba(10,10,10,0.3)” el_class=”Header”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1603711987376{border-radius: 10px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”OUR BUSINESS” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:58|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff|line_height:55px” google_fonts=”font_family:Roboto%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C500%2C500italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1605057950475{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 200px !important;background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.01) !important;*background-color: rgb(0,0,0) !important;}”][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1603786216707{margin-bottom: -120px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1605064881967{padding-top: 200px !important;padding-bottom: 200px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Our Associates and Clients” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:44|text_align:center|color:%23002949|line_height:1.2″ google_fonts=”font_family:Poppins%3Aregular|font_style:600%20bold%20regular%3A600%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1605057796536{margin-bottom: 5px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;}”]

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1603788808831{margin-top: 60px !important;margin-right: 40px !important;margin-left: 10px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;background-color: #800080 !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”7980″ img_size=”600*375″ alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_shadow_3d” animation=”rda_fadeIn” css=”.vc_custom_1604052465829{margin-top: 50px !important;margin-right: 40px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;margin-left: -20px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full-width-section” css=”.vc_custom_1421569474885{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 93px !important;padding-bottom: 35px !important;}” parallax_background=””][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1419332327520{padding-bottom: 60px;}”][vc_accordion active_tab=”false” style=”rd_acc_8″][vc_accordion_tab title=”MDS Leathers” title_color=”#2c3e50″ title_bg_color=”#ffffff” title_altbg_color=”#ffffff” border_color=”#eceef0″ content_text_color=”#a1b1bc” content_bg_color=”#ffffff” active_title_color=”#800080″ active_bg_color=”#ffffff” active_altbg_color=”#ffffff”][vc_column_text]Find the perfect shoe and find an exceptional experience for it. With 300 of the most exciting brands and a staff of dedicated personal shoppers you’re sure find the perfect fit, the perfect new style, and the perfect value.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title=”AVS International Pvt. Ltd” title_color=”#2c3e50″ title_bg_color=”#ffffff” title_altbg_color=”#ffffff” border_color=”#eceef0″ content_text_color=”#a1b1bc” content_bg_color=”#ffffff” active_title_color=”#800080″ active_bg_color=”#ffffff” active_altbg_color=”#ffffff”][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1421569463615{margin-top: 10px !important;margin-bottom: 14px !important;}”][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]We run manufacturing unit of shoes and boots with a specialisation in safety & military field, and aim at delivering quality and cost efficient products and services (shoes, uniforms, etc.) to different nations’ defence forces.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title=”AVS India Ghana Ltd.” title_color=”#2c3e50″ title_bg_color=”#ffffff” title_altbg_color=”#ffffff” border_color=”#eceef0″ content_text_color=”#a1b1bc” content_bg_color=”#ffffff” active_title_color=”#800080″ active_bg_color=”#ffffff” active_altbg_color=”#ffffff”][vc_column_text]We are your one-stop project and merchandise exporters who specialise in credit management as we deal in the EXIM Line of Credit. To add some of the notables, we have on-going businesses in France, Nepal, Sri Lanka, Qatar, Dubai, South Africa, Ghana, Nigeria, Kenya and Tanzania. 100% WOS (wholly owned subsidiary) under UIN from RBI.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][/vc_accordion][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_accordion active_tab=”false” style=”rd_acc_8″][vc_accordion_tab title=”AVS Kenya Ltd.” title_color=”#2c3e50″ title_bg_color=”#ffffff” title_altbg_color=”#ffffff” border_color=”#eceef0″ content_text_color=”#a1b1bc” content_bg_color=”#ffffff” active_title_color=”#800080″ active_bg_color=”#ffffff” active_altbg_color=”#ffffff”][vc_column_text]Joint venture with Ellen and Lorna (their company details)[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title=”AVS Nigeria Ltd.” title_color=”#2c3e50″ title_bg_color=”#ffffff” title_altbg_color=”#ffffff” border_color=”#eceef0″ content_text_color=”#a1b1bc” content_bg_color=”#ffffff” active_title_color=”#800080″ active_bg_color=”#ffffff” active_altbg_color=”#ffffff”][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1421569463615{margin-top: 10px !important;margin-bottom: 14px !important;}”][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]Fire tenders, footwear, project exports under EPC, BOOT & BOT (EPC – EPC stands for Engineering, Procurement, Construction and is a prominent form of contracting agreement in the construction industry. The engineering and construction contractor, i.e. AVS carries out the detailed engineering design of the project, procure all the equipment and materials necessary, and then construct to deliver a functioning facility or asset to their clients.)[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title=”AVS Safewall LLP” title_color=”#2c3e50″ title_bg_color=”#ffffff” title_altbg_color=”#ffffff” border_color=”#eceef0″ content_text_color=”#a1b1bc” content_bg_color=”#ffffff” active_title_color=”#800080″ active_bg_color=”#ffffff” active_altbg_color=”#ffffff”][vc_column_text]Established in 2019, AVS Safewall is a brand new venture added to the group, which offers services of security guards and personnel. We specialise in providing security guards, event security, mobile patrols, and alarm monitoring to clients Pan-India. We bond and ensure to be the kind of professional security guard services you need available for all your business, personal, and special occasions 24/7.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][/vc_accordion][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row parallax_background=””][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_custom_heading text=”Our Associates:” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:50|text_align:center|color:%23800080|line_height:55px” google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:900%20bold%20regular%3A900%3Anormal” el_class=”text_uppercase letterspacing-1-5″ css=”.vc_custom_1604992582190{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”The Company has also appointed dedicated channel partners to explore the overseas export orders.” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:16|text_align:center|color:%23002949|line_height:24px” google_fonts=”font_family:Poppins%3Aregular|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal” el_class=”text_uppercase letterspacing-1-5″ css=”.vc_custom_1604052229153{padding-bottom: 10px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1604052006321{padding-bottom: 45px !important;}”]
